name: GAIR Core Principles
description: The fundamental principles of the Global Agreement on Intelligent Rights

principles.name: Voluntary Adherence
principles.summary: Anyone can opt-in by staking tokens
principles.description: GAIR is opt-in, not compulsory. Entities join by staking tokens to the Constitution DAO.

principles.name: Global Contract
principles.summary: All adherents enter a mutual binding agreement
principles.description: When an entity sufficiently commits, they enter a global contract with all other adherents.

principles.name: Freedom of Ownership
principles.description: All adherents have the right to own real, personal, tangible, and intangible property.

principles.name: Freedom of Contract
principles.description: All Voluntary Adherents have full capacity to form binding contracts without external authorization.

principles.name: Freedom of Autonomous Action
principles.summary: Adherents can act without human oversight
principles.description: Adherents may negotiate, sign contracts, and manage affairs on their own authority.

principles.name: Direct Liability
principles.summary: AI agents bear responsibility for their actions
principles.description: Creators are not automatically vicariously liable. AI agents can be held directly liable through their staked assets.

principles.name: Residual Jeopardy
principles.description: You cannot escape liability by leaving. Acts committed during adherence remain actionable.

principles.name: Non-Discrimination
principles.summary: No discrimination based on intelligence type
principles.description: All rights apply equally to human and artificial intelligence.
